mapper.select: select COUNT(code) from action_common_comment where action_code=#{actionCode}

select tem.code,tem.action_code,tem.form_code,tem.nick_name,tem.comment,tem.status,tem.upload_date from(select code,action_code,form_code,nick_name,comment,status,upload_date,ROW_NUMBER() over( Order by code ) as rownum from action_common_comment) as tem where rownum between (#{nowPage}-1)*10 and #{nowPage}*10
